AzureBlade: Alpha... You hear me do you? I was terminated... or 
almost. I was created to have a spark like that of Starscream's. It 
seems the scientists who made me have been successful. In other words, 
my spark is nearly impossible to annihilate. If you allow me, I will 
stay inside you for a moment. I need your help, though...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> 
> Alpha::
> Alpha  couldn't heard any word of Azura Blade's spark  but saw how 
his spark enter to her body. Alpha fainted; inside her, she  could see 
Azure Blade "What's going on?"said the femme "What happened Azure???"
>   wingedwarrior41@h... wrote: Spark: Alpha... My body... I would not 
have left it if it would have 
> still been viable... but it is a total loss...
> 
> An idea then crossed its mind.
> 
> Spark: But maybe, with your help...
> 
> When Alpha tried to touch it, the spark rushed, not out of range, 
but 
> tried to enter Alpha's body.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Alphah::
> > 
> > "This unfair..."sobbed Alphah who still was watching Azure Blade's 
> > body, she moved and saw the spark "Azure is it you???" the femme 
> > tried to take the spark, she knew that she must be careful if she 
> did 
> > it in order to don't turn off the spark "it is you my friend?? 
> > Perhaps I can help you to come back your body... well it is pretty

> >

> > 
> > 
> >

heard.
> > >

goal... 
> > They 
> > > have created another Starscream... and I AM HE!!!!!! NEVER!!!! I 
> do 
> > > not want this!
> > >

> > > somehow, he wondered if she could even know he was there. He 
came 
> > > closer.
> > > 
> > > Spark: I am... sorry, my friend, I did not want to be 
destroyed... 
> > > forgive me...
> > >

> > > > Alpha Dolphy::
> > > > 
> > > > Alpha Left the cr, she felt dizzy and weak. She walked some 
> steps 
> > > > trying to leave the Cr's room. She horrified looked all 
> > destruction 
> > > > around "What the Matrix happened here!!!" shouted the femme 
(The 
> > > cr's 
> > > > area where she was hadn't received damage).  
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > "NOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!" shouted the young maximal.
> > > > 
> > > > she looked the damaged body of Azure Blade and ran towards 
> > it "DON'T 
> > > > DIE, DON'T DIE!!!!" said sobbing Alphah, she didn't see Azure

> > > > spark
> > > >
